skinTypes.name: Oily Skin
skinTypes.description: Oily skin produces more natural oil (sebum), which can cause shine, enlarged pores, and a higher chance of breakouts.

skinTypes.name: Dry Skin
skinTypes.description: Dry skin lacks sufficient moisture and may feel tight, rough, or flaky.

skinTypes.name: Combination Skin
skinTypes.description: Combination skin has both oily and dry areas, typically with oiliness in the T-zone.

skinTypes.name: Sensitive Skin
skinTypes.description: Sensitive skin reacts easily to products or environmental factors.

skinTypes.name: Normal Skin
skinTypes.description: Normal skin is well-balanced with minimal concerns.
